column2: "Na EWURADZE kasaa kyerɛɛ Moses nye Aaron wɔ Egypt asaase do dɛ
"Bosoom yi bɛyɛ abosoom ahyɛse ama hom: ɔbɛyɛ afrenhyia mu bosoom a odzi kan ama hom."
"Hom nkasa nkyerɛ Israel mboanofo no nyinara dɛ
column3: Bosoom yi ne da a otsia du no mu
column4: wɔmfefa nguambaa nkorkor
column5: dɛ mbrɛ hom egyanom efiefi tsetsee

column2: "na sɛ ofidua no suar dodow dze ma eguambaa kor a
column3: ɔno wɔmma ɔnye ne nyɛnko a ɔbɛn ne fi mfa kor dɛ mbrɛ akra no hɔn dodow tse; dɛ mbrɛ nyimpa biara n’edzidzi tse no
column4: na hom mfa mbu eguambaa no ano."

column2: "Hom eguambaa nyɛ dza onndzi dzɛm
column3: onyin a oedzi afrenhyia a: hom nyi no wɔ nkɔsɔw anaa mpɔnkye mu:"

column2: "na hom mfa no nsie ma onkodu bosoom kor no ara ne da a otsia duanan no: na Israel mboanofo kuw no nyina nkuku hɔn ewimbir."
"Na wɔmfa bɔgya no bi
column3: na wɔmfa nsera efi a wobedzi no wɔ mu no n’apondua ebien no nye mpondua etsifi no ho."

column2: "Na wondzi nam no anadwe no ara
column3: wɔmfa gya ntoto
column4: na wɔmfa epitsi boodoo

column2: "Mma wonndzi no amon
column3: nkyii so mma wɔmmfa nsu nnoa
column4: mbom wɔmfa gya ntoto; ne tsir nye no ntwɛr na ɔnye n’ayamudze no."

column2: "Na mma hom mma no ho biribiara nnka ma adze nnkye do; na dza ɔbɛka ma adze akye do no hom mfa gya nhyew."
"Na mbrɛ hom ndzi no nye yi; hom mbobɔ hom asen do
column3: hom mpaboa nhyehyɛ hom anan
column4: na hom mpoma nkitsakitsa hom nsamu: na hom ndzi no ɔhar do: ɔyɛ EWURADZE apaho."

column2: "Osiandɛ mubotwa mu wɔ Egypt asaase do anadwe no
column3: na muboku Egypt asaase do mbakan nyinara
column4: nyimpa nye mbowa nyina; na mubobu Egypt enyame nyinara ntsɛn: emi nye EWURADZE."

column2: "Na bɔgya no bɛyɛ asɛnkyerɛdze ama hom wɔ efi a hom wɔ mu no ho: na sɛ muhu mbɔgya no a
column3: mebɛpa hom ho
column4: na ɔyardɔm bi nnkɛba hom do abɛsɛɛ hom
column5: sɛ morobɔbɔ Egypt asaase no a."

column2: "Na da yi nyɛ nkaa mma hom
column3: na hom nhyɛ no fa mma EWURADZE: hom mfa mbra do nyɛ no afahyɛ wɔ hom ebusuasantsen mu daa."

column2: "Nda esuon na hom ndzi epitsi boodoo; da a odzi kan no ara na hom nyi mbɔrkaw mfi hom efiefi: na obiara a obedzi mbɔrkaw boodoo ofitsi da a odzi kan no do dze kodu da a otsia esuon no do no
column3: ɔkra no wobotwa no efi Israel."

column2: "Na da a odzi kan no hom nyɛ no nhyiamu krɔnkrɔn
column3: na da a otsia esuon no so nhyiamu krɔnkrɔn; mma wɔnnyɛ edwuma biara wɔ mu
column4: gyedɛ dza nyimpa biara bedzi nko na hom nyɛ."

column2: "Na hom ndwen epitsi afahyɛ no do; na dɛm da yi ara so na miyii hom dɔm no mifii Egypt asaase do: dɛm ntsi hom ndwen da yi do wɔ hom ebusuasantsen mu nyɛ no mbra daa."
"Bosoom a odzi kan no mu
column3: bosoom no mu da a otsia duanan ewimbir no
column4: na hom ndzi epitsi ma onkodu bosoom no mu da a otsia eduonu biako ewimbir."

column2: "Nda esuon na mma mma wonnhu mbɔrkaw wɔ hom efi mu: na obiara a obedzi dza ɔaka no
column3: ɔkra no wobotwa no efi Israel mboanofo mu
column4: sɛ ɔyɛ ɔmamforanyi o
column5: obi a wɔwoo no wɔ asaase no do o."

column2: "Mma hom nndzi biribiara a akaw; hom ndzi epitsi wɔ hom tsenabew nyinara."
"Nna Moses frɛɛ Israel mpanyimfo nyinara
column3: na ɔsee hɔn dɛ
column4: Hom nkɔ nkeyiyi nguambaa dɛ mbrɛ hom ebusua tsetsee

column2: "Na hom mfa odwonhataw  (hisɔp)    siaw
column3: na hom mfa mbɔ bɔgya a ɔwɔ bɛɛsen no mu no mu
column4: na hom mfa bɔgya a ɔwɔ bɛɛsen no mu no bi mpetse mpondua etsifi nye apondua ebien no ho; na mma hom mu obiara mmfir edzi mmfi ne fie abowano ma onkodu anapa."
column5: "#12.22 HISƆP:Dua bi a nna wɔdze n’ahataw yɛ ahosan atɔrmuadze wɔ Egypt."

column2: "Na EWURADZE botwa mu abɔbɔ Egyptfo; na sɛ ohu bɔgya no wɔ mpondua etsifi
column3: nye apondua ebien no ho a
column4: EWURADZE bɛpa ɔpon no ho
column5: na ɔnnkɛma ɔsɛɛfo no kwan ma ɔaaba hom efi mu abɔbobɔ hom."

column2: "Na hom ndwen iyi do ma ɔnyɛ mbra mma ɔwo nye wo mba daa."
"Na ɔbɛba dɛ
column3: sɛ hom du asaase a EWURADZE dze bɛma hom no do
column4: dɛ mbrɛ ɔabɔ anohoba no a
column5: ɔno hom ndzi ɔsom yi do."

column2: "Na ɔbɛba dɛ
column3: sɛ hom mba bisa hom dɛ
column4: Hom som yi ase nye dɛn?"

column2: "Ɔno hom nse dɛ
column3: Ɔyɛ EWURADZE n’apaho afɔrbɔdze
column4: nyia ɔpaa Israelmba hɔn efi ho wɔ Egypt
column6: na oyii hɛn efi fii mu no. Na ɔman no bɔɔ hɔn tsir adze na wɔsɔree."

column2: "Na Israelmba kɔree kɛyɛɛ dɛ mbrɛ EWURADZE hyɛɛ Moses nye Aaron no."
"Na ɔbaa dɛ esuom no
column3: EWURADZE bɔbɔɔ Egypt asaase do mbakan nyinara
column4: ofi Farao n’abakan a ɔtsena n’ahengua do no do dze kodu adaduadan mu ndɔmmum n’abakan do; nye ofiembowa mbakan nyinara."

column2: "Na Farao soɛɛr anadwe no ara
column3: ɔno
column4: nye no nkowaa nyinara
column5: nye Egyptfo nyinara: na su kɛse baa Egypt; osiandɛ fie biara nnyi hɔ a obi ennwu wɔ mu."

column2: "Na ɔfrɛɛ Moses nye Aaron anadwe
column3: na ɔsee dɛ
column4: Hom nsoɛr
column5: hom mfi me man mu mfir
column6: hom nye Israelmba no nyina; na hom nkɔ nkɔsom EWURADZE

column2: "Hom mfa hom nguan nye hom anantwi so
column3: dɛ mbrɛ hom aka no
column4: na hom nkɔ; na hom nhyira mo so."

column2: "Na Egyptfo no piapiaa ɔman no dɛ wɔrepam hɔn ntsɛm efi asaase no do; na wɔsee dɛ
column3: Hɛn nyinara ayɛ ewufo ara nye no."

column2: "Na ɔman no fefaa hɔn mbɔr ansaana ɔrekaw
column3: hɔn mbɔrakorow no wɔakyekyer no wɔ hɔn atam mu sisi hɔn kɔn ho."

column2: "Na Israelmba no yɛɛ dɛ mbrɛ Moses kae no; na wobisabisaa dwetɛ ndwindze
column3: nye sika ndwindze
column4: nye atam wɔ Egyptfo hɔ:"

column2: "na EWURADZE maa ɔman no enyimpa wɔ Egyptfo no enyim
column3: ma wɔmaa hɔn nsa kaa dza wobisae no. Na wɔfoom Egyptfo egyapadze kɔree."

column2: "Na Israelmba no sii mu fii Rameses kɔr Sukɔt
column3: mbanyin ara a wɔnam famu bɛyɛ mpem ahaesia
column4: a mbofraba nnka ho."

column2: "Na aforafora dɔm so nye hɔn kɔree; na nguan
column3: na anantwi
column4: mekyerɛ ofiembowa piigyan."

column2: "Na wɔdze mbɔr a wɔdze fi Egypt bae no totoo epitsi tatar
column3: nna ɔnnkawee; osiandɛ wɔpaam hɔn fii Egypt ntsi
column4: na woenntum enntsinntsim
column5: nkyii so woennsiesie edzidzidze biara amma hɔnho."

column2: "Afei tsena a Israelmba dze tsenaa Egypt no yɛ mfe ahaanan eduasa."
"Na ɔbaa dɛ mfe ahaanan eduasa no n’ewiei no
column3: mekyerɛ da kor no ara
column4: EWURADZE no dɔm nyinara tui fii Egypt asaase do."

column2: "Ɔyɛ anadwe a ɔwɔ dɛ wɔhyɛ no nsew ma EWURADZE dɛ oyii hɔn fii Egypt asaase do: iyi nye EWURADZE n’anadwe no a wɔhyɛ no nsew wɔ Israelmba nyinara mu wɔ hɔn ebusuasantsen nyina mu no."
"Na EWURADZE see Moses nye Aaron dɛ
column3: Iyi nye apaho no ho mbra no: ɔnanaben biara nndzi bi:"

column2: "na nyimpa biara n’akowaa a ɔdze sika atɔ no no dze
column3: sɛ etwa no twatsia a
column4: ɔno ondzi bi."

column2: "Mma ɔmamforanyi nye akowaa ɔpaanyi nndzi bi."
"Ofi kor mu na wondzi; mma mmfa nam no bi mmfi fie no mu mmpue; nkyii so mma hom mmbu ne biew bi."
"Israel mboanofo nyinara ndzi do."
"Na sɛ ɔhɔho bi bɛnye wo tsena
column3: na ɔpɛ dɛ odzi apaho no ma EWURADZE a
column4: ma wontwa ne mbarimba nyinara twatsia
column5: na nkyii ɔntwe mbɛn na ombedzi; na ɔnyɛ dɛ nyia wɔawo no asaase no do: monomonomnyi biara dze mma onndzi bi."

column2: "Mbra kor na ɔnda hɔ mma nyia ɔyɛ okuromnyi
column3: nye ɔhɔho a ɔtsena hom mu."

column2: "Na Israelmba nyinara yɛɛ dɛm; dɛ mbrɛ EWURADZE hyɛɛ Moses nye Aaron no
column3: dɛmara so na wɔyɛe."

column2: "Na ɔbaa dɛ da kor no ara
column3: EWURADZE yii Israelmba no fii Egypt asaase do dɛ mbrɛ hɔn dɔm tsetsee."
